title: Fidden
description: Fidden is a salon booking backend system designed to let users easily schedule salon appointments at their preferred time and date. It also supports salon-side management, allowing salon owners to control their availability, view bookings, and manage services.
features: Secure authentication using JWT
Users and Salon owners can update their personal information and preferences.
For salon owners, manage working hours and block out unavailable dates.
For users, create, update, cancel, or view current and past appointments.
For salon owners, View and manage all customer bookings in real time.

title: Nutrigenix
description: Here is my latest terminal-based project, which operates like a command prompt. It also includes typing animations to enhance the appearance, similar to a traditional command prompt. This project is built using Next.js.
features: Frontend designed with interactive UI using React and Framer Motion
AOS (Animate On Scroll) enhances scrolling experience with delightful animations

title: Talk of Time
description: A new website powered by React and Node.js, featuring captivating animations with Framer Motion and AOS. It ensures a seamless user experience with smooth navigation and dynamic content updates.
features: Backend built with Node.js and Express for robust handling and MySQL for database
Frontend designed with interactive UI using React and Framer Motion
AOS (Animate On Scroll) enhances scrolling experience with delightful animations
Search from job section, working on backend

title: ZingSeat World
description: An e-commerce platform where users can browse products or register as sellers. Built to deliver smooth product management and secure checkout.
features: User and seller panels with login/signup system
Advanced product search and filtering
Add to cart and order tracking
JWT authentication for secure access

title: Coffee House
description: A basic web project created after learning MySQL integration with Node.js and Express. Showcases CRUD functionality with a simple interface.
features: View coffee items and details
Add and delete coffee records
Fully functional CRUD operations

title: Speed Of Creativity
description: An online platform for learning coding where users can create and complete coding assignments and challenges.

title: PakeHeart Yoga
description: An online educational website where admins can add class-recorded videos and users can bookmark their favorites.
